content.title: Comprehensive Handicrafts Cluster Development Programme
content.details: The objective is to develop these two clusters with world-class infrastructure. The guiding principle behind the design of clusters would be to create world-class infrastructure that caters to the business needs of the local artisans & SMEs to boost production and export. In brief, the main objective of setting up these clusters is to assist the artisans & entrepreneurs in setting up world-class units with modern infrastructure, the latest technology, and adequate training and HRD inputs, coupled with market linkages and production diversification. SPV is designed in such a way, it will have Standard Models of units of SSI and SME with infrastructure that is customized to give a competitive edge and these centers have greater potential to become globally competitive.
eligibility: The Implementing Agency (IA) shall be a Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV), which will be a legal entity, preferably a company, with the participation of related stakeholders, particularly the leading manufacturers, suppliers, buyers, and artisan federations/SHGs.
The SPV shall be selected preferably through an open competitive bidding process.
Selection of SPV would mainly depend on the project profile, activities required to be intervened, and on various other parameters.
documents_required: Sale /lease deed of land/building in the name of SPV.
